department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 以Arduino為開發工具平台，學習互動設計之能力。包含:建立互動設計之程式設計能力、學習Arduino之裝置使用，以及各項感測器之應用
goal.en: "Using Arduino as a development tool platform, learn the ability of interactive design. Including: the ability to build interactive programming, learn the use of Arduino devices, and the application of various sensors."

outline.ch:
"1. 課程說明
2. 互動技術介紹
3. 互動裝置案例說明
4. Arduino的程式架構
5. Arduino函式庫與基礎操作實習
6. 感測器介紹
7. 輸入輸出說明
8. 電子電路基礎與電路圖繪製
9. 序列傳輸與類比讀取
10. 溫濕度傳感器與其它感應的應用
11. 藍芽與Arduino的使用
12. 專題應用實作"
outline.en:
"1. Course description
2. Interactive technology introduction
3. Case description of interactive devices
4. Arduino program architecture
5. Arduino function library and basic operation practice
6. Sensor Introduction
7. Input and output description
8. Electronic circuit foundation and circuit diagram layout
9. Sequence transmission and analog reading
10. Temperature and humidity sensor and other sensing applications
11. Bluetooth operation practice
12. Application project implementation"

textbook.en:

ch.competencies: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習

en.competencies: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning
